name: Sala - Poisoned
text:
2 level 3 monsters
Once per turn, during your Standby Phase, detach 1 Xyz Material from this card. If you cannot, destroy one monster you control or banish this card. Once per turn, you can detach up to 2 Xyz material(s) from this card and apply the appropriate effect; 
1 - Destroy 1 Spell/Trap card your opponent controls.
2- Banish 1 Spell/Trap card your opponent controls.
